name: Cardboard Frank
description:
/!\ Performance is low on web build, if you have issues use the downloaded version /!\
- Web build uses WASD controls -

You are Cardboard Frank, the mightiest hero of Cardboard City.

Some of the citizens dared to insult the all-divine Rock, by saying cardboard was the best material. The Rock then decided to obliterate the city by sending meteors of molten lava towards it.

You must prevent those from destroying the city for as long as possible, by sending cardboard crates towards them !

Pick them up across the city, charge your throw, aim well and do your best ! But be careful, cardboard isn't that tough, hero or not.

Controls :

Z/S (W/S) : Fly forward/Backwards

Q/D (A/D) : Strafe Left/Right

A/E (Q/E) : Fly up/down

Shift : Fly faster

Spacebar : Brake

Credits :

Lucas LEPLAT : Gameplay Dev & FX

Lison RICHOUX : Character Designer & 2D Artist

Clément ESCULIER : 3D Artist

Cédric MEVEL : Level Designer & Developer

Aurélien MONTERO : Music & SFX
